import { Container, Row, Col, Image, Card, Button, Table} from "react-bootstrap"; import profile from '../img/profile.jpg' import { Outlet, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; import "../components/Button.css" const ProfilePage = (props) => { const [name, setName] = useState(localStorage.getItem("name")) const [email, setEmail] = useState(props.currentUser) const [pass, setPass] = useState(localStorage.getItem("password")) const navigate = useNavigate(); if(props.loginStatus !== true){ navigate("/"); } return ( {/* PAGE LEFT: */} {/* Dummy placeg=holder for now- TODO replace with company logo */} {/* image generated from https://smashinglogo.com/ and used for non for profit educational purposes */} {/* PAGE RIGHT */} Profile Name: {name}
# First Name Last Name Username
1 Mark Otto @mdo
2 Jacob Thornton @fat
3 Larry the Bird @twitter
{ } ); } export default ProfilePage;
